item.title: Learn Offline (during travel)
item.description: If you want to get the most out of your time during travelling, on a train, on an airplane or just on public transportation - if you live in a city where this is an option - I suggest the use Pluralsight’s desktop and mobile clients for the experience of offline usage. You can find the applications download links here https://www.pluralsight.com/downloads
